title: 2nd Place Web Dev - Himsika
details: Awarded 2nd Place in a Web Development Competition organized by UNSIKA, demonstrating strong capabilities in building responsive interfaces, integrating backend systems, and presenting a complete web solution under competitive conditions.

title: 3rd Place LKS XXXIV Web Technologies - Semarang
details: Secured 3rd Place in the XXXIV Web Technologies competition at the Semarang city level, showcasing technical proficiency in modern web development, structured coding practices, and effective problem-solving within a timed environment.

title: 3rd Place CTF Competition - WreckIT
details: Achieved 3rd Place in a Capture The Flag (CTF) cybersecurity competition organized by Badan Sandi dan Siber Negara, demonstrating analytical skills in cryptography, web exploitation, digital forensics, and secure system analysis.

title: Laravel Programming
details: Completed an intensive Laravel Programming training program focused on backend development, MVC architecture, RESTful API design, database relationships, and best practices for building scalable and maintainable web applications.

title: Digital Forensics
details: Completed a Digital Forensics certification program by Security Blue Team, focusing on incident investigation, evidence acquisition, log analysis, and forensic reporting. Gained hands-on experience in analyzing compromised systems and identifying indicators of compromise using industry-standard methodologies.

title: Fundamentals of Cyber Security
details: Completed a foundational cybersecurity course covering key concepts such as network security, threat analysis, vulnerability assessment, and basic ethical hacking practices, along with hands-on exercises to understand and protect computer systems effectively.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
details: Completed a JavaScript fundamentals course covering core concepts such as variables, data types, functions, loops, conditionals, events, and basic DOM manipulation, along with hands-on exercises to build interactive web features.

title: Fundamentals of Web Programming
details: Completed a foundational web programming course covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with essential concepts such as responsive design, DOM manipulation, and structured web development practices.
